Key Match Events: The match was called off without a ball being bowled because of rain.
Pre-Game Insights: USA’s head coach Stuart Law said that his team would be aiming to make Americans take notice of their success.
Post-Match Reflections: The USA will face South Africa in their first game of the Super Eights, followed by the West Indies.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA kicked off their campaign with a win over neighbours Canada and then pulled off the biggest upset in the tournament’s history by beating Pakistan in a super over.
Others: The USA finish their group phase with five points, coming second in Group A behind India.
Pakistan are the latest high-profile team to be knocked out of the tournament after New Zealand were also sent home.
